description: Displays timeseries data from different periods on the same chart

configuration.name: conf_accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

configuration.name: conf_compare
configuration.title: Compare
configuration.description: Number of historical windows to compare

configuration.name: conf_comparestepsize
configuration.title: Compare step size (s)
configuration.description: The gap between each historical window (e.g. 86400 is one day)

configuration.name: conf_trimpercent
configuration.title: Trim Percentage
configuration.description: Percentage to trim from min and max values, defaults to 10%

configuration.name: conf_clipsize
configuration.title: Clip size
configuration.description: Number of pointsto clip from data set

configuration.name: conf_refreshrate
configuration.title: Refresh rate (s)
configuration.description: Leave blank to auto refresh, set to zero to disable refresh, otherwise set number of seconds to wait before refresh.

configuration.name: conf_alignment
configuration.title: Alignment
configuration.description: How the timeseries should be aligned

items.title: Start: Align by timeseries start points
Middle: Align by timeseries mid points
End: Align by timeseries end points
